title: Chat Restricted, but not sure why
body:
Hey guys. So I got chat restricted, but I really am not sure why. In the first game, I had 2 people afk, and the other 2 guys (premades) where blaming me for them afking even though I only said at start of the game "Please dont afk :) ". I got a bit angry, muted them and expressed my anger to enemy team. Second game I straight up cant see where I was being toxic. Here are the logs:
Game 1
In-Game
Reded: once got 11
Reded: xD
Reded: dude i said
Reded: REALLY
Reded: AGAIB
Reded: i swear
Reded: dude
Reded: would be saame
Reded: fking idiots
Reded: 2 games in a row
Reded: 2 afk
Reded: are u serius
Reded: why rep me
Reded: mid open i guess
Reded: HOW=?
Reded: I JUST SAID
Reded: PSL DON AFK
Reded: wtf
Reded: bro
Reded: com on
Reded: dude
Reded: my dog died
Reded: my mom in hospital
Reded: fuck off
Reded: nice q
Reded: moron
Reded: push mid or top pls
Reded: do herald or smting
Reded: ty
Reded: u suck
Reded: pref that
Reded: ?
Reded: instead of tryng
Reded: to be positive
Reded: pref someone toxic?
Reded: is that  it?
Reded: u all stupid
Reded: i muted u
Reded: so i cant seee what u type
Reded: u worse than the afk
Reded: blaming me
Reded: f off
Reded: u know jack bout life
Reded: paly all day
Reded: not doing anything with ur life
Reded: they dont want
Reded: they blame me for the game
Reded: acutally sad
Reded: they toxic
Reded: they think they good
Reded: cause they won bot
Reded: bs game
Game 2
In-Game
Reded: 50 grams pls
Reded: ik
Reded: ur stupid
Reded: wasnt my intention xd
Reded: teemo stfu
Reded: cry baby
Reded: bro
Reded: im fking diamond
Reded: u think im palying seriusly
Reded: in iron
Reded: xD
Reded: dude
Reded: u tryharding
Reded: in fking flex
Reded: u msut have 0 friend
Reded: teemo toxic pls rep
Reded: he dont talk xD

replies.body:
Reded: u tryharding
Reded: in fking flex
Reded: u msut have 0 friend
Reded: teemo toxic pls rep
Reded: ur stupid 

Pretty sure these are all toxic behaviour

> [{quoted}](name=ThyDelutionist,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:16:11.971+0000)
>
> Reded: u tryharding
> Reded: in fking flex
> Reded: u msut have 0 friend
> Reded: teemo toxic pls rep
> Reded: ur stupid 
> 
> Pretty sure these are all toxic behaviour

the 0 friend part is taken out of context. barely responded to what temo said. He was harasing me whole game. But i got the ban not him idk why

> [{quoted}](name=Reded,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:31:44.187+0000)
>
> the 0 friend part is taken out of context. barely responded to what temo said. He was harasing me whole game. But i got the ban not him idk why

If he was harassing you the whole game, why not just mute him and report him when the game ended? Why respond?

And how do you know that the teemo didn't get punished?

> [{quoted}](name=Reded,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:31:44.187+0000)
>
> the 0 friend part is taken out of context. barely responded to what temo said. He was harasing me whole game. But i got the ban not him idk why

I get it man... Since teemo flames as well u demand riot to chat ban him too.. Unfortunatelly riot doesnt ban all flames and that is a fact...  The automated system doesnt detect half of flames... I can mathematically proven it to you if you like

> [{quoted}](name=Reded,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:09:49.070+0000)
>
> cant see where I was being toxic
> 
> Reded: fking idiots
> Reded: mid open i guess
> Reded: fuck off
> Reded: moron
> Reded: u suck
> Reded: u all stupid
> Reded: u worse than the afk
> Reded: f off
> Reded: u know jack bout life
> Reded: paly all day
> Reded: not doing anything with ur life
> Reded: bs game
> Reded: ur stupid
> Reded: teemo stfu
> Reded: cry baby
> Reded: im fking diamond
> Reded: u think im palying seriusly
> Reded: in iron
> Reded: u msut have 0 friend
> Reded: teemo toxic pls rep

There. Right there. That is where you were relentlessly toxic, all over the place, nonstop, in every game.
I agree with you, you don´t deserve a chat restriction at all, you deserve a permaban.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherKaiser,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:21:30.734+0000)
>
> I agree with you, you don´t deserve a chat restriction at all, you deserve a permaban.

why?

> [{quoted}](name=MotherKaiser,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OYQkBxda,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-12-22T14:33:46.352+0000)
>
> The entire chatlog you just posted is the answer to your ¨why?¨
> Enjoy your fresh ban.

Nvm dude. I checked ur profile and all you are doing is flaming people who got bans. All you are doing is teling them they deserve the ban but I am prety sure the only toxicity in these games is not deservable of a ban. I think you are part of the problem. Karma is coming for u dear sumoner :)

Neglecting does not mean learning, and you sir, you are asking for opinion but can´t take an opinion that agrees with Riots decision.
Your chatlog is full of insults and racism, I really hope riot checks this chatlog deeply and escalates.

Read your own words: 

Reded: fuck off
Reded: nice q
Reded: moron
Reded: push mid or top pls
Reded: do herald or smting
Reded: ty
Reded: u suck
Reded: pref that
Reded: ?
Reded: instead of tryng
Reded: to be positive
Reded: pref someone toxic?
Reded: is that it?
Reded: u all stupid

This kind of language gets you a free ban.

Chat restrictions are useless.

This is just a perfect example of average players losing their shit over the game and honestly...nobody cares. 
If you do care, you should get a life.

You deserve the punishment though simply because you threatened your fellow flamers with reports while you flamed just as much yourself.

And this is my main issue with Riots dumb player parenting system. The whole witch hunt for toxic players  just becomes part of the usually player interaction.
Before you had disagreements about whatever and sometimes it ended with a bit of flame.
Now it ends with flaming, followed by calling each other toxic and reporting each other.

A lot of players just have this narrative in their heads, that they are always right, they are the better players, it's the other's fault, the others are toxic, the others deserve a report.

So basically until you and many others stop reporting players for shit you are doing yourself, this discussion is just pointless.

Riot probably knows that their system doesn't actually improve player behavior however they don't care, because they also know that players who get each other banned will still pay money after losing their account and on top of that they can still use the system as good PR. "Oh look at us, we really care, our game is inclusive and blah blah!" LUL
